explanation: [0-0] On a stage stands a man with black hair, wearing a yellow top and blue pants. He holds a golden trophy in his hand and wears a medal around his neck. To his left is a man in khaki clothes and a white headscarf. A man with black hair in black clothes is supporting the man in yellow. Behind them is a wall covered with sponsors, displaying seven portraits with national flags and a hand above them.

[0-3] The man in yellow walks off the stage, and a yellow circle appears on the screen along with the yellow subtitle "RONALDO JR" and numerous yellow emojis. After stepping off the stage, he celebrates with his teammates, while the hand above points to the first portrait. Below the portrait is the Portuguese flag, and the number 1 appears beneath it.
